channel.title: [.fla/.swf] MSN Simulator
channel.description:
I made [url=http://www.zyroxic.com/whike/glen_Simulator]this thing[/url] some time in January. So basically it simulates a "ordinary" conversation with some idiot. =]
[img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/6426/fgtbx9.png[/img]
[url=http://www.zyroxic.com/whike/glen_Simulator]test page[/url] [url=http://img393.imageshack.us/img393/2624/msnru9.swf]SWF File[/url] [url=http://www.zyroxic.com/files/msn.fla]source files[/url]
[i]Actually look at it before you post so you get what the hell I'm talking about =}[/i]

item.title: [.fla/.swf] MSN Simulator
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

Glen says: hey Glen says: so wat r u doing Glen says: lol hav u seen da chipmunk movie? barluxia` says: jjjjjjjjj Glen says: so wutcha doin? barluxia` says: jiojiojiojiojiojiojio Glen says: lol wuts jiojiojiojiojiojiojio? barluxia` says: fap Glen says: so wutcha doin? barluxia` says: ima fapping Glen says: lol wuts ima fapping? barluxia` says: what you do to yourself at night Glen says: so wutcha doin? barluxia` says: fapping Glen says: lol wuts fapping? barluxia` says: fun Glen says: so wutcha doin? barluxia` says: WTF Glen says: lol wuts WTF? Glen says: so wutcha doin? barluxia` says: fap Glen says: lol wuts fap? barluxia` says: fapfapfap Glen says: so wutcha doin? barluxia` says: 7chan.org Glen says: lol wuts 7chan.org? barluxia` says: evil Glen says: so wutcha doin? barluxia` says: YOU GOT RICKROLLED Glen says: lol wuts YOU GOT RICKROLLED? Glen says: so wutcha doin?

It’s fun to mess with. Not as fun as SmarterChild though

Read full topic

item.title: [.fla/.swf] MSN Simulator
item.dc:creator: @marluxia marluxia
item.description:
@marluxia wrote:

Unhandled:

Funneh. Try adding some sort of AI to it maybe?

it does have a shitty AI deep inside the fla ;D

var processMessage:Function = function(input:String) {
	youSays(input);
	if(glensLast == "hey") {
		if(input == "hi" || input == "hey" || input == "hello")
			setTimeout(glenSays, 500, "so wat r u doing");
	}
	...
Bryanc:

You should take out that edit page or make it password protected. I just deleted it lol…

lolllllllllllllll
